scripts.test-hamster: concurrently --kill-others "npm run ganache" "npm run test test/HamsterTest.js"
scripts.test-round: concurrently --kill-others "npm run ganache" "npm run test test/purefiRoundTest.js"
scripts.full-test: concurrently --kill-others "npm run ganache" "npm run test test/purefiFarmingTest.js test/purefiTokenTest.js"
scripts.test-farming: concurrently --kill-others "npm run ganache" "npm run test test/purefiFarmingTest.js"
scripts.test-token-mainnet: concurrently --kill-others "npm run ganachemain" "npm run test test/purefiPairDeployMainnetTest.js"
scripts.test-token-bsc: concurrently --kill-others "npm run ganachebsc" "npm run test test/purefiPairDeployBSCTest.js"
scripts.test-buy-bsc: concurrently --kill-others "npm run ganachebsc" "npm run test test/purefiTokenBuyerTest.js"
